title: CARIBBEAN_TREASURES
author: CARIBBEAN_TREASURES
created_time: November 15, 2023, 08:01:08 PMLast edit: January 07, 2024, 05:30:39 AM by CARIBBEAN_TREASURES
content: Anyone need a Keevo hardware wallet for their collection? Never used Shelf model!  I have one available for .0065 btc shipped. I'm also open for trades of other physical items, silver bullion and collectables.  Benefits:Secure recovery without seed phraseMulti-factor multi-signature security2.8” color touchscreenDurable stainless steel casingOptional beneficiary service Standard Edition includes:Keevo™ Model 1Keevo Carbon Key™USB Type-C Cable (26")Founder's Edition includes:Keevo™ Model 1Keevo Carbon Key™USB Type-C Cable (26")Desktop Display CaseNFT Bundle includes:Keevo™ Model 1Founders Edition numbered CaseCarbon Key™ return case1 year Keevo Care1 year Secure Storage and Beneficiary ServiceFounders Edition NgraphT Season Pass for VIP White List Invites1 NFT from our inaugural drop of the Stolen Scream CollectionKeevo Model 1•  Size: 95 mm x 58 mm x 11 mm (3.74” x 2.28” x 0.44”)•  Weight: 120 g (4.23 oz)Dual chip architecture including:ST Micro STM32WB55 general purpose MCU with two embedded cores and a secure partition.M4F for the main applications and functions which require less securityM0+ for the RF and security features. The M0+ is completely locked away to protect the RF Stack and the Infineon Optiga Trust-P secure elementDisplay: 2.8” (71 mm) diagonal LCD, 320 × 240 pixel, capacitive touch screenBiometric sensor: 10 mm (0.39”) diameter Fingerprint sensor with        proprietary matching algorithms Battery: 3.8V / 500mAh lithium-ion polymer, up to 6 hours of continuous use and several months in idle modeCarbon Key™ connectors: corrosion-resistant gold pogo pinsTop enclosure: Precision zinc-allow case with bead-blasted finishBottom enclosure: molded glass-fiber reinforced ABS with a rubberized texture appliqueOperating temperature: 0°C to +45°C (32°F to 113°F)Certifications: CC EAL5+, CE, RoHS, FCCLimited Edition Premium USB Type C Connector:22.5" Type C cableHigh-speed charging and sync: output power up to 20V, 3 Amp, which is ensured by high-speed safe charging. USB 2.0 supports data transfer speed up to 480MbpsFlexible, military-grade nylon braided mesh cord with aluminum          housing connectorsStandard Edition Basic USB Type C Connector:22.5" Type C cableFlexible cordABS housing connectorsKeevo Carbon Key™Size: 23 mm x 58mm x 11 mm (0.91” x 2.28” 0.44”)Weight: 30g (1.06 oz)Enclosures: Precision zinc-alloy case with bead-blasted finish; molded glass-fiber reinforced ABS with a rubberized textureCarbon Key™ connectors: custom gold pogo pinsOperating temperature: 0°C to +45°C (32°F to 113°F), limited charging below +10°CExclusive Desktop Display CaseSize: 167 mm x 117 mm x 48 mm (6.58” x 4.60” x 1.90”)Weight: 150 g (5.29 oz)Enclosures: premium leather, molded glass-fiber reinforced ABS with a rubberized textureBrushed aluminum, custom engraved and limited edition numbered      nameplate

comments.body: If you want one of the original Keevo models, here you go. Make offers. I take BTC or silver bullion trade.

comments.body: Model 1 Founders edition still on the desk. $200 value. will trade or take btc.
